response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality and exclusivity. Understanding its significance to you, we aim to make this acquisition as seamless as possible. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer not only presents a significant savings but also secures your place among our esteemed clientele. Should you choose to accept, we assure you of a personalized experience, including expert consultation and assistance throughout the transaction process. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 950000}
